summary: A new fancy, unique looking ruin styled player home with a cool location.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/title3xrgvo6h2a.jpg[/img]


[u][b][color=#DAA520]Requirements:[/color][/b][/u]
-) Skyrim patched with latest patch
-) nothing else

[center][youtube]C_n7YXP3B3g[/youtube][/center]

[i]Big thanks to [b]twallace267 [/b] please visit his other videos and give him a lot of likes. 
[url=http://www.youtube.com/user/MrBiggenGaming?feature=watch]twallace267\'s videos[/url]


[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/descriptiong1q2auz8o9.jpg[/img]

Again I thought it would be time for me to create another fancy dwemer styled home. This time I really created every aspect of the house
from ground up, which means you won\'t find the same or nearly the same structure once again in the game.
I have thought why not making a cool dwemer themed home which has all necessarities in nearly one room and also has a cool story to tell.
You know as I am sadly uncapable of making quests atm. I try to tell my stories with letters or the home itself.
This home is based around dwemer combined with nature and the deadric god [b][color=#00FF00]Peryite[/color][/b] and one of his special 
followers.
You will find really cool lightning and a humble atmosphere. My lightning is based on [i]\"cause and consequence\"[/i], which means that
every light has a source and a reason why it\'s there. No lightning just floating around with no candle or lantern emitting it.

[b][color=#DAA520]Getting there:[/color][/b]
Inisde the downloaded folder you will find a image file which shows you 2 locations.
I suggest you start from Bloodlet Throne, once you\'re there head directly to the first map marker which will lead you infront of the house.

I hope you like the home and it\'s various features and beautiful spots and take the time to endorse the mod.
Also note that the mod is fully Navmeshed.

Well let\'s go to a short overview of the features that come with that house.


[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/featuresos9t68dh7n.jpg[/img]

[color=#CD853F][b]Exterior:[/b][/color]
-) hidden beautiful path to the home
-) a lot of flora and fauna which matches perfectly the scenery
-) dynamic weather
-) the previous owner awaiting you
-) water and insects
-) appropriate lightning

[color=#CD853F][b]Interior:[/b][/color]
-) place for you and your follower to sleep
-) lot\'s of [color=#a52a2a]SAFE[/color] storage
-) 4 Mannequin\'s
-) a unique enchanting station
-) unique alchemy station
-) weapon racks to store your stuff
-) bookshelfs (initially cluttered)
-) fireplace to cook your meat
-) unique cooling system (thanks to [color=#daa520]tueffelachtein[/color] and [color=#daa520]Tamira[/color])
-) study area
-) cool and creepy entrance

[color=#CD853F][b]Small Cave:[/b][/color]
-) a tree themed around Peryite which is standing in a pool of poison
-) a poison forge
-) a smelter
-) other crafting facilities
-) storage for your crafting supplies

Generally every room or exterior has unique and hopefully humble and appropriate lightning. Also there are various sound effects.
I hope they are appropriate also and don\'t disturb the scenery.


[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/installationcsmuzavkwb.jpg[/img]

Klick on the download with NMM manager button and install the mod.

[u][b]Manual:[/b][/u]
If you want to install this mod manually, you have to download it and unpack the archive somewhere. After you unpacked it drop the DwemerDomain.esp and .bsa into your Skyrim/Data folder. Later on chose your prefered launcher and activate the .esp.


[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/uninstallationh7l2odtwm6.jpg[/img]

Again I suggest using the NMM, which provides a much easier way to handle mods.

[u][b]NMM:[/b][/u]
Deactivate the mod in the NMM mod list and delete it afterwards.

[u][b]Manual:[/b][/u]
Remove the DwemerDomain.esp and .bsa from your Skyrim/Data folder.


[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/faql30fbxp7mh.jpg[/img]

[i][color=orange]Q: Is this mod cleaned with TES5Edit?[/color][/i]
A: Yes ofc. it was cleaned and checked with it.

[i][color=orange]Q: Where is the house located?[/color][/i]
A: You can either look the Screenshots on the mod page or in the folder

[i][color=orange]Q: Could you add this and that for me?[/color][/i]
A: Just post it in the comments and I\'ll see what I can do.

[i][color=orange]Q: Why no quest or sth. like that?[/color][/i]
A: Sadly I am not good enough to make quests atm., but you will find a short story about the old owner once you find him.


[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/updatese19yjrt26g.jpg[/img]

English Version has now also a english Map Marker.


[img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/creditse4wcoyzmd7.jpg[/img]

Blary for his fantastic resources I used  ------>  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2250922/?]Blary\'s Profile[/url]
Oaristys & Tony67 for their fantastic Modders Resource pack  ------>  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2235573/?]Oaristys Profile[/url]
tueffelachtein for his Resources  ------>  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1815925/?]tueffelachtein\'s Profile[/url]
Vicn for his fantastic creatures Pack  ------>  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3863233/?]Vicn\'s Profile[/url]
Hanaisse for converting the creatures to statics
Tamira as always for her fantastic help in numerous places and situations
Bethesda for creation of the game and the CK


[center][img]http://img3.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/special1n64ydzbwo.jpg[/img][/center]


[size=+2][b]Finally don\'t forget to enjoy the mod and the game !!![/b][/size]


[b][color=lightorange]OtherMods[/color][/b]

Please if you like the mod you should also visit or check out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3507075/?]Nahkin\'s Mods[/url]

Also I suggest you to visit the following awsome house modders or their projects:
[color=orange]o[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/85197/?]dj2005\'s Mods[/url]

[color=orange]o[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3189192/?]RatFinkk\'s Mods[/url]

[color=orange]o[/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/6406513/?]Petemichaelbabicki\'s Mods[/url]

(more to come)
author: Nahkin
